hadiths.text: ‘Abd Allah b. al-samit told that Abu Dharr said :Messenger of Allah! A man loves some people, but he cannot do work like their work. He replied; Yes, Abu Dharr, will be with those whom you love. Abu Dharr then repeated it. The Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) also repeated it

chapter.ara-name: باب إِخْبَارِ الرَّجُلِ الرَّجُلَ بِمَحَبَّتِهِ إِيَّاهُ
chapter.eng-name: When one man loves another because of some good that he sees
